name: Gangster Shapes
description:
"Gangster Shapes" the ULTIMATE battle between the GEOMETRIC GANGS.

HOW TO PLAY:
You just have to press where you want to go. The goal of this is to control all the actions of the game just by touching somewhere on the screen (no buttons) . This is geared especially for mobile and tablet devices. Check my other games, they all have the same characteristic

To execute the action you must hold down. The action varies depending on the Item you have in your hands:

NO ITEM: Running
STICK: Melee fight
GUN: Shoot
TWO GUNS: Dual Shoot

If all your gang members die, you lose. If your gang survives you go to the next round.

Game made in 72 Hrs for ScoreSpace Jam #23. Programming, design, music and SFX are authored by LDPFDEV.
